extendedInfo.description: Works on Android 2.1 and greater.Changelog: http://bit.ly/bIh45CAlerts you with audio and/or vibration when your phone is fully charged.Great for when you want a quick charge without checking your phone every minute.Also great if you don't like leaving your phone plugged in after it's charged.Pro version available! See in-app help for info.

reviews.title: Uhhhh.....
reviews.comment: Sometime it doesn\'t work till now it is 9th time of failure in alerting me.I set everything ok like alert tone,alarm on blh blh blh.
reviews.author: Debabrata Nayak

reviews.title: Sound Alert Option
reviews.comment: It works perfectly. It would be nice if you can add an option for changing the sound alert.
reviews.author: Edbert Kent Arana

reviews.title: no sound
reviews.comment: the sounds not working..it only vibrates when its fully chrgrd..wht if im far? how will i recognize, pls fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great however wish you could use your own ringtones you\'ve downloaded as alert sounds.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for. It just needs to be notification sound customizable and support for app2sd
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix it
reviews.comment: Please fix bug when battery is fully charged and play alarm here is fine but when I unplug the charger then does not stopped the alarm so fix it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be good, but you can\'t pick the alarm sound and the default is a creepy man yelling at you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: HTC Desire HD running CM 7.1. One issue, when on the phone the alarm does not go off and it shouldn\'t but it didn\'t go off when the call ended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good alarm battery for xperia w8.. No need to worry anymore
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sammmmsung S3
reviews.comment: its not wrking on my phone...it doesnt make any sound even when the battery is fully charged..maybe ther is smthng wrong with the settings...someone please guide me???
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good. If you don\'t like to leave your phone plugged in after is fully charged this app is the right for you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love, Love, Love this app!!!! I often fall asleep while charging my phone. But this wakes me up, so I don\'t over charge, & mess my battery up!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very usefully app!
reviews.comment: Very useful application. I use it regularly...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app but still need something
reviews.comment: Hello,  Thanks for the simple yet helpful application, It works perfectly on my Galaxy S4,  Still need one more option, that is to make user free to choose the alarm tone from his local media,  The reason behind this is that sometimes you need a calm sound rather than the shout \"I\'m fully charged\" which is waking everybody at home:)  Please accept my warmest regards, Saleh
reviews.author: Saleh Shaki

reviews.title: Finally works
reviews.comment: After some tweeking and beatin the bushes finally I knew what the problem and it was the reset level. Finally the alarm goes off when my droid fully charged. Glad didn\'t uninstalled and kept curious all this time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: what happened !!
reviews.comment: it was working perfectly but it doesn\'t now it just vibrates i am using galaxy sII
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Exactly what it should be rated... I mean the app practically turns ur device to a superhero screaming \"I-AM-FULLY-CHARGED\"!!! dat alone gets me all charged up LOVE this app
reviews.author: Alandis Thomas

reviews.title: Nice app. Keep open for audible alarm.
reviews.comment: Keep the app running on the screen at all times while charging and the alarm should sound. This should hopefully be a work around for anyone who doesn\'t hear the alarm. Samsung Galaxy Indulge.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Im fully charged!!! Never fails on my note 2.a 5 star apps
reviews.author: anoyarou

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: When we disconnet the charger the notification should turn off automatically
reviews.author: Mohamed Nejah
